softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
description: Building an Angular application to replace a legacy Java GUI.
Design scable components and services that are easily re-used.
Utilize RxJS to effeciently handle HTTP requests and responses.
Ensure quality by writing unit and end-to-end tests.

dataAnalyst.title: Data Analyst
description: Researched and reported on financial data using Python, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
Scraped data from online sources with Python.
Developed complex queries to access and join necessary data points.
Worked with product owners to deliver data requests to customers, journalists, and executives.

accountManager.title: Account Manager
description: Solved issues with Tomcat, MySQL, Linux, and more.
Maintained Mac, Windows, and Linux server environments.
